name: Candy Bubble Crush Christmas Edition- Most popular time killer sweet casual game
name_original: Candy Bubble Crush Christmas Edition- Most popular time killer sweet casual game
description:
Candy bubble Crush for Christmas brings a new way of match-3 fun in Christmas day. New candies, more star combinations and challenging game modes brimming with purple sugar soda!

Features:

* Over 259 Sodalicious candy levels in Saga Land
* Create amazing power-ups and use them to clear the screen!
* Explore juicy new environments and meet the Christmas characters
* Mouth-watering new graphics, Candy Crush never looked so tasty
* Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master all with strategic swiping!
Enjoy this casual game during this Christmas day!
